channel.title: Virtue 3 - opensource community RS3 project
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ll2ufoW.png[/img]
Well since more and more people are beginning to ask me more about RS3, so I am starting a community project for the RS3 protocol. I don't care to hear that this is pointless, or mentioning about other unrelated topic to this framework. I will report the post to be removed. Please feel free to give feed back to the contributors of the project, I know there are some user's out there that will help, a lot on the other hand, some will either learn from it and some wont that's their own problem. I want to make this server as user-friendly as possible.
[b][u]Paid Contributors[/u][/b] Kyle Fritz Emperor(Busy right now) [b][u]Contributors[/u][/b] James™ Chryonic zfsi - Support Image -------------------------------------------- [i][b]Please post below if you would like to contribute to this, also shoot me a pm with your skype![/b][/i]
[u][b]Donations[/b][/u] Current amount of donations: 300$ I will be accepting any donations toward this, it will be used to pay higher experienced developers none of this money will be used for personal use it will be used for Virtue 3 only! Send me a PM if you would like to help out and donate, And no just just anyone who contributes will be paid, you will have to prove to me that your worth being paid.
[img]http://stonedesigns.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/02/octocat.png[/img] https://github.com/MeezyProductions https://github.com/MeezyProductions/Virtue-3-opensource/commits/master http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/projects/609645-virtue-3-opensource-community-rs3-project.html
[u]Q: Why are you doing this?[/u] A: Because there ARE people out there that like RS3, your opinion on that isnt needed. [u]Q: Who do you think will use this?[/u] A: I don't expect anyone to use this right now, but if it goes far enough where content is ready to be added, development might pick up. [u]Q: What revision will this be?[/u] A: 857, the client will be eventually renamed enough for you to load higher data at ease.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CiXLHQT.png[/img]
[i][u][b]Support Image[/b][/u][/i] [img]http://i.imgur.com/39WvMvK.gif[/img]
[/center]

item.title: Virtue 3 - opensource community RS3 project
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

it’s too early on in your project to be faggily naming your commits. know what ‘initial’ means, and if you’re lazy and frustrated like me usually at least name them something more sensible like ‘asdfffffffff’, or ‘stupid bug fix’, etc.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Scully wrote:

It’d be cool to see this go somewhere.

Read full topic

Looking forward to keeping up with this, good luck.

item.title: Virtue 3 - opensource community RS3 project
item.dc:creator: @Sir_James1996 Sir James1996
item.description:
@Sir_James1996 wrote:

[center]

Well since more and more people are beginning to ask me more about RS3, so I am starting a community project for the RS3 protocol.
I don’t care to hear that this is pointless, or mentioning about other unrelated topic to this framework. I will report the post to be removed.
Please feel free to give feed back to the contributors of the project, I know there are some user’s out there that will help, a lot on the other hand,
some will either learn from it and some wont that’s their own problem. I want to make this server as user-friendly as possible.

Paid Contributors
Kyle Fritz
Emperor(Busy right now)
Contributors
James™
Chryonic
zfsi - Support Image

Please post below if you would like to contribute to this, also shoot me a pm with your skype!

Donations
Current amount of donations: 300$
I will be accepting any donations toward this, it will be used to pay higher experienced developers none of this money will be used for personal use it will be used for Virtue 3 only!
Send me a PM if you would like to help out and donate, And no just just anyone who contributes will be paid, you will have to prove to me that your worth being paid.


GitHub

MeezyProductions - Overview

MeezyProductions has 3 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.


github.com/MeezyProductions/Virtue-3-opensource

Initial

by MeezyProductions on 07:34PM - 27 Oct 15 UTC
changed 1 files with 4 additions and 28 deletions.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/projects/609645-virtue-3-opensource-community-rs3-project.html

Q: Why are you doing this?
A: Because there ARE people out there that like RS3, your opinion on that isnt needed.
Q: Who do you think will use this?
A: I don’t expect anyone to use this right now, but if it goes far enough where content is ready to be added, development might pick up.
Q: What revision will this be?
A: 857, the client will be eventually renamed enough for you to load higher data at ease.

CiXLHQT.png798×599

Support Image

[/center]
